title: [SOLVED] 200+ Ms from riot servers
body:
Was in a ranked game and all of a sudden me and 4 other ppl started getting 200+ ms, after we lost I check my internet speed test and the latency test on riots website and it was all good, around 20 ms.

 I go into sandbox mode and Im still at 200 ms, I ask my friend who also lives in Ontario Canada like me and he's lagging too

Anyone else from ontario or nearby having this problem? doesn't seem to be going anyway rn

Edit: Using rogers, started happening around 10:30 at night

replies.body: Mu ping is back to normal. I can't speak for anyone else but on my end it's all fixed {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Same here, also with rogers. 


Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  192.168.0.1 
  2     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  192.168.0.1 
  3    72 ms    14 ms    12 ms  99.244.0.1 
  4    15 ms    12 ms    16 ms  66.185.90.93 
  5    33 ms    15 ms    25 ms  209.148.230.165 
  6    43 ms    19 ms    20 ms  69.63.248.6 
  7    20 ms    18 ms    22 ms  24.156.144.122 
  8    27 ms    25 ms    26 ms  209.148.230.138 
  9   204 ms   239 ms   254 ms  eqix-ch2.chi01.riotdirect.net [206.223.119.235] 
 10   203 ms   186 ms   256 ms  104.160.131.44 
 11   198 ms   180 ms   219 ms  104.160.131.103 
 12   220 ms   210 ms   198 ms  192.64.170.1 

Trace complete.

Likely a rogers issue. I had a similar thing happen with overwatch before that only effected rogers customers.

I'm with rogers as well. I guess we found the issue. I'm in a custom game right now and the ping is consistently lowering, it's sitting at 160 for me now. Should be okay soon

It's at about 100 for me now

Down to 80

Back up to 120
My ping is hovering around 40 right now
that helps a lot thanks, i'm only having the problem with league though, my other games are fine
Having a severe issue myself. I was able to play this afternoon with no issues, but tonight has been rough. Laggy gameplay.
me too, it was all fine today until around 10:30 for me it started lagging bad
Same

Its happening to me as well. Living in Midland, Ontario. I was in a game and my ping shot from 28 to 240 and it won't budge from that point. I've reset my router three times and rebooted my computer as well. The issue happens on every league account I own. All speed tests on my end show that nothing is wrong with the connection.
yeah same here, my ping is still hovering at 200+ its gotta be the servers
Progress report, ping lowered to 190!! Thanks Riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Lowered to 160 for me now, looks like something positive is happening!

Kidding went back to 190

Also Ontario.  Also Rogers.


Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  RCMP-Surveillan [192.168.1.1] 
  2    13 ms    11 ms    38 ms  99.254.202.1 
  3    11 ms    19 ms    11 ms  66.185.91.145 
  4    14 ms    12 ms    28 ms  so-5-0-2.gw02.wlfdle.phub.net.cable.rogers.com [24.153.7.246] 
  5    14 ms    10 ms    11 ms  pos-1-0.gw01.nmkt.phub.net.cable.rogers.com [66.185.81.185] 
  6    22 ms    29 ms    22 ms  209.148.230.138 
  7   169 ms   170 ms   181 ms  eqix-ch2.chi01.riotdirect.net [206.223.119.235]

 11   169 ms   168 ms   152 ms  192.64.170.1 

Trace complete.
There are 3 of us, all from Ontario and all with Rogers that are experiencing this as well...
Just wanna say that same thing is happening here. Living in Ottawa, ON, with Rogers as well. Constant 200ping, no spikes,  but can't play.
I am having an issue with this lag. I live in Minnesota and my computer says its ping is at around 30, but my league client says that my ms is 200. Please help!
I played a ranked game last week and encountered the same exact problem, and the ping is staying consistently above 200 ms, how do I fix it? it's beyond frustrating =/

I've been out sick myself for the past couple days, but I'm not seeing any widespread issues happening lately. Even still, let's go ahead and check that connection for any packet loss using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) so that I can get a closer look at what's going on. Use that reader to scan your latest network logs, and post a screenshot of what it shows here.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JATAyrqE,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-09-14T20:56:23.706+0000)
>
> I've been out sick myself for the past couple days, but I'm not seeing any widespread issues happening lately. Even still, let's go ahead and check that connection for any packet loss using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) so that I can get a closer look at what's going on. Use that reader to scan your latest network logs, and post a screenshot of what it shows here.

everything is fine now my ping is back to normal but thank you for the help anyway.
everything finally seems to have fixed itself as of a few minutes ago. rocking about a 35-40 ping. a little higher than normal but def playable.
Same here, Ottawa, ON, with Rogers. Ping was at 200 ms at 10:30pm, went up to 280 at 11pm. Now at 11:30pm it's down to 160ms.
SAME!!!!!!!!!! Rogers user but the ping seems to be fine when testing speed online. Ping came down to 160 last game but its unplayable.
